article_title: GOP Mainstream Lacks Concerted, Well-Funded Anti-Trump Plan
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The GOP establishment is growing increasingly agitated that Donald Trump appears to be cruising to the nomination, yet mainstream Republicans lack a concerted, well-funded attack plan four months after he leapt to the top of the polls.

A handful of scattered, uncertain efforts to try to stop Mr. Trump—one super PAC recently compared him to a hippopotamus—have failed to dent his popularity. And a number of 2016 rivals and GOP leaders appear reluctant to wage war with Mr. Trump for fear of alienating his...

article_summary:
And a number of 2016 rivals and GOP leaders appear reluctant to wage war with Mr. Trump for fear of alienating his...
WASHINGTON—The GOP establishment is growing increasingly agitated that Donald Trump appears to be cruising to the nomination, yet mainstream Republicans lack a concerted, well-funded attack plan four months after he leapt to the top of the polls.
A handful of scattered, uncertain efforts to try to stop Mr. Trump—one super PAC recently compared him to a hippopotamus—have failed to dent his popularity.
